meanings.definition: Wasts: third person singular present of waste
meanings.sent1: He wasts time playing video games instead of studying.
meanings.sent2: She wasts water by leaving the tap running while brushing her teeth.
meanings.sent3: The lazy squirrel wasts its energy on gathering acorns it won't eat.
meanings.sent4: The candle wasts away slowly, its flame flickering in the dark.
meanings.sent5: The careless gardener wasts the fertile soil by not planting any seeds.

meanings.sent1: The wasts of the old building were scattered across the field.
meanings.sent2: We cleaned up the wasts left behind after the picnic.
meanings.sent3: The children turned the beach wasts into a creative sandcastle.
meanings.sent4: The wasts of the fallen leaves created a colorful carpet in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The recycling center sorted through the wasts to find items that could be reused.
